alert.note: Alert for Central Beaufort Sea Coast; Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast; Northern Arctic Coast; Northwest Arctic Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 08 at 1:11PM AKST until November 10 at 7:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM THURSDAY TO 7 AM AKST FRIDAY... ...REPLACES THE PREVIOUS HIGH WIND WATCH WHICH HAS BEEN CANCELLED... * WHAT...East winds gusting as high as 65 mph. Blowing snow creating low visibilities down to 1/2 mile. * WHERE...Northwest Arctic Coast, Northern Arctic Coast, Central Beaufort Sea Coast and Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...From 4 AM Thursday to 7 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. A few power outages are possible.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for blowing snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.

area.areaDesc: Central Beaufort Sea Coast; Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast; Northern Arctic Coast; Northwest Arctic Coast
